___preventBodyScrolling.description: Prevent from scrolling the body element while the popup is visible.

___enabled.description: If true sets overflow hidden on the body to prevent scrolling while visible.

___visibility.description: Show or hide the popup depending on flag presence.

___flag.description: Name of the flag indicating the visibility of the popup.

___onTop.description: If true the popover gets a very high z-index to be on top of every other content.

___onActions.description: Names of the actions that trigger opening of the popup.

___enabled.description: If true the first suitable child element of the popover gets the focus on open.

___closeIcon.description: Allow the user to close the popup using an icon or the escape key.

___enabled.description: If true the popup is closed when escape key or the close icon is pressed.

___close.description: Close the popup upon action request.

___onActions.description: Names of the actions that trigger closing of the popup.

___name.description: Name of the exported area used to show or hide content.

___forcedClose.description: React to the user forcing the popup to close.

___action.description: Name of the action that is published whenever the popup is closed by user interaction.

___enabled.description: If true a focus change via tab key to any element outside of the popover is prohibited.

___backdropClose.description: Allow the user to close the popup by a backdrop click.

___position.description: Configuration for the positioning of the popup.

name: laxar-popup-widget
description: Shows a popup with content areas for other widgets.
